original: Hultgren, Karl David Eugén, redaktör, sekreterare, Söderköping, f. 17/12/ 91 i Ö. Eneb}^ öistergötl. 1. G. 12 m. Anna Magnusson. Barn: Mary f. 12, Arne 17, Hans 21, Greta 24, Lars 25. — Realex. i Norrköp. 07, vol. i Norrköp. Tidn. s. å. Res. t. Engl. 10, Danm. 32. Medarb. i Norrköp. Tidn. 07-12, red:sekr. i Söderköp. Tidn. 12-29, lokalred. i Söderköp. f. östergötl. Dagbl. sed. 29. Sekr. h. stadsfullm. o. dess beredn:utsk. 21-46, led. av ’stadsfullm. sed. 47 o. av kyrkorådet, ordf. i styr. f. folkbibl. sed. 24, led. av styr. f. Söderköp.-ortens erk. sjukkassa sed. 35. Medl. av Pubhkl. sed. 25 o. av Sv. journ:fören.
translated: Hultgren, Karl David Eugén, editor, secretary, Söderköping, b. December 17, 1891 in Ö. Eneby, Östergötland. Married 12 months with Anna Magnusson. Children: Mary b. 1912, Arne b. 1917, Hans b. 1921, Greta b. 1924, Lars b. 1925. Attended Realskola in Norrköping in 1907, worked at Norrköping Tidning the same year. Traveled to England in 1910 and Denmark in 1932. Worked as a contributor at Norrköping Tidning from 1907 to 1912, was the editor-secretary at Söderköping Tidning from 1912 to 1929, and was the local editor at Östergötlands Dagblad in Söderköping beginning in 1929. Secretary for the City Council and its Committee from 1921 to 1946, a member of the City Council since 1947, a member of the church council, chairman of the board for the public library since 1924, and a member of the board for Söderköping's recognition of sickness benefit since 1935. A member of the Swedish Press Association since 1925.
